node.category: What is the way things are?
What different kinds of medicine do humans use?

node.surface: From time immemorial humans have had complementary medicine,
and it has not generally been ineffective.

node.category: Should humans use less of other types of medication?

node.surface: A reduction in the amount of chemically produced medication per person is most certainly desirable.

node.category: What happens if production of chemical medications is reduced?

node.surface: This will do little damage to the pharmaceutical industry,
and conventional medicine will also hardly suffer.

node.category: What is effective about complementary medicine?

node.surface: The patient could learn to be more aware of his or her body and to treat it more healthily.
